rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0001
rows.name: Elma-san, look at that![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0002
rows.name: Were we a step too late!?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0003
rows.name:
No, not yet.
Look at that sea surface.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0004
rows.name: A defensive field!?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0005
rows.name: The Life is a system indispensable for humanity's survival.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0006
rows.name:
The defensive field protecting its core
has not been breached yet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0007
rows.name: Which means[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0008
rows.name: The Central Life is safe, isn't it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0009
rows.name: Yes, but we can't rest easy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0010
rows.name:
Even if the defensive field prevents enemy intrusion,
it doesn't mean the operation time limit is extended.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0011
rows.name: We must hurry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0011_02
rows.name:
For the sake of humanity's future,
let's defeat the Growth![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0011_03
rows.name:
That's right-meh!
We'll beat them to a pulp-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0012
rows.name: You're reliable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0013
rows.name:
Yes, this is[ST:wide ]—
A battle carrying the hopes of everyone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0013_2
rows.name: We cannot retreat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0014
rows.name: This is Elma to all teams.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0015
rows.name:
My team will now breach the interior of the Central Life
and activate the backup system.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0016
rows.name: Doug, Irina, Gwin, and L, accompany us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0017
rows.name:
Other teams, make securing the route your top priority.
After the breach, focus on defending the position.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0018
rows.name:
The mission objective is not the annihilation of the enemy.
Do not mistake that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0019
rows.name: Team Grasida, roger![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0020
rows.name: Trishula, roger![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0021
rows.name: Ningirsu, roger![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0022
rows.name: Balmung, roger![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0023
rows.name:
Team Surtr. We will secure the Colonel's route
while mopping up enemies![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0024
rows.name: Breach unit, let's go.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0025
rows.name: Roger![ST:wait ]
